content: **crochet and felted trivet for christmas in drops snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ee-577 yarn group e or c + c ---------------------------------------------------------- measurements after felting diameter approx 22 cm / 8 3/4 measurements before felting diameter approx 31 cm / 12 1/4 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 50 g color no 01 off white 50 g color no 53 light gray 50 g color no 46 medium gray drops crochet hook size 7 mm or size needed to get 10 double_crochet x 6 row = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm
